company.about:
Hello this is Syed Zubair Haque, i have been working with Mohammad Al Mojil Group since 1997 in the construction field, i have beening doing planning and project control work all these years.

This company have given me a lot i have learn lot of things, and also i have help this company in many project in preparing clams.
